name: Get The BrainCells
description:
As a white blood cell you must gather up all of the braincells lost in the stomach of some rando. Like seriously who is this person? Are they famous? It would be cool if they were famous, and this game had a story. Wow, I do have unreasonable dreams.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Up/Left/Right Arrows to move.

LeftClick  in air to deploy braincells

LeftClick when in contact with a braincell to collect it.

"E" when in contact with a Nerve Cell to go to another level
